resources.string:
Doorbean : The Menu App that provide Restaurants Admins with a platform to share their Restaurants menu on the app with various info like Price , Dish Type , Dish Name. Where all the user has access to all the menu provided by admins ,that they can order food form just seeing the phone , thus reducing use of papers and also maintain hygiene among all visitors to Restaurants.
 Doorbeen also provides admins to add exact photo of their menu in the app.
 This app intended for fair use , it does not try to feature any kind of Hatred , Bullying of any Restaurants owner . 
You can Check our Privacy Policy and Terms And Conditions.
